Table of Contents

  • Requirements:
    • Steps:
    • Proxy setup / Vpn Setup
  • Create Email Address
  • Find A US Drop Address from Carding Secrets Site
  • Register a https://www.burberry.com Account
  • Fill out the shipping address as per your drop info and billing address
  • Find your product and add to favorites
  • Item to checkout
  • Drop address
  • Checkout
  • After Carding


Requirements:

  • Method – the most valuable item in carding. Gladly you have this to work with
    • NonVbv CC with Fullz – Buy a CC From wcc
    • Proxy/Vpn or Rdp – For changing our virtual location while carding
    • Phone number – Recipient number to send notifications and flight updates

Steps:

  1. Buy Non vbv Fullz From WCC

Go to wcc-plug.su and create a new account, fill your email and create password.
Use this link to avoid scam sites: https://wcc-plug.su  Many sites try to clone and host this site so make sure you click on the link above or type direct on address bar. Do not search for results. Account creation is free but make sure you top up your account in a day to avoid suspension. 
Go to your preferred country of choice and select Gold Cards. They work best. In my case I will work with US. Make sure you choose a card with full info and nonvbv like the one below



All cards are live and A balance checker is available so make sure you use it. Will help in making orders and make sure your card can hold the order amount.

Choose a full info card*fullz*

  • Address
  • Nonvbv
  • Fullz
  • Names
  • Cvv

Proxy setup / Vpn Setup

Make a good decision on these as they play a big role in carding success rate. For Proxies, use vip72.com. They are the best providersFor VPN, most will work as long as the check is %100 ip check score. If you already have a vpn, check the score on whoer.net. If you don’t have a vpn, use express vpn and hma vpn

Create Email Address

A matching email with some of the cardholder’s name will always remain the best option to create an email. Also, if you can make domain email with cardholder’s name, you are good to go. Else ….

Create a Hotmail Email with one or two names from Your Fullz. Don’t use funny email providers
Yahoo, Hotmail, AOL, Gmail, and any other premium like hosting email will work fine.

Find A US Drop Address from Carding Secrets Site

Take advantage of the free drop addresses from wcc new users and have your goods to wcc drop. This is easy and have been good for a long time, it the most preferred if you don’t have an option. If you already have a drop, use your own it’s all right. Wcc drop is just a fake office where the courier will drop your items and we will collect them, you will provide your preferred addresses and pay shipping to your point of collection. You can provide any info you want since this will not be from the site and no risk to even in put your official home address.
Free for new users for like 2 orders only, the rest you will have to pay for every delivery to our drop since we pay for office. Ask for addresses when ready to card and have topped up your wcc account.

Else, you can follow this guide to create a drop address from carding secrets website  https://cardingsecrets.su/?page_id=652


Register a https://www.burberry.com Account

 Head on to https://www.burberry.com and Create an account. Use the email you created and the fullz info from wcc to create account
Select register and start filling the details from your fullz
Every detail should be as of your correct country fullz including country.
Don’t copy paste, just take your time, its even advised to be slow in filling these fields. Don’t rush.



Fill out the names and dob as of your fullz. Make sure you chose a fullz with correct info.

A link will be sent to your email address, click the link to confirm the email and you should be good to go

Fill out the shipping address as per your drop info and billing address

To make our account fully functional, we will need to fill all of the info in the following tabs as of the pic below.



Find your product and add to favorites

Whenever you get a site with a gift option, it is the best for carding. When we type our drop address, the site will be ok since our order is under gifts and will think we are trying to send to someone else apart from us.
Luckily our site has a gift option in the upper right tab



Just browse for your type of stuff you want and add to favorites. Even though we will not checkout them but it will create a good activity in our site and look somehow legit.

Item to checkout

After you have browsed for some time and added your goods to favorites. Head back and click on the GIFTS Tab and find your item of choice to card. Make sure it will fall under $500.
Here is my item of choice


I will be buying this from a card from wcc to illustrate the method. It’s not much of use to me but will get you to understand the method.
The price is 490, not bad since my card balance is about $1700. I checked in wcc when buying. Most of clothing shops are easy to card as not many carder prefer them, its not easy to sell clothes for money so carders prefers items that can be resold.
This is a big advantage since the industry is not that secured

Drop address

The next step will be to fill your shipping address. If you had inputted in the steps above, you will just choose from the options presented and make sure you choose the drop, don’t choose the billing address.
Tick the gift option after selecting the delivery option. We will mark our order for gift packaging and add our message the message box.
Draft a personal message and fill in the box below.
Always take note of the messages and know they will be printed and this means they will be ready.







Here is my gift message, make a personal one and guess the occasion like birthday, new year, valentine etc. depending on the time of purchase.



 


Checkout

 Add your card details and make sure you chose a nonvbv Card. If you look in the right side of the site, you will see this logo

for Mastercard secure code verification system meaning any master card you try to use will hit 2fa and if its secured? Then count your carding as a failure


Fill your card details from wcc and save.
Next continue to checkout

  • Place order
    With everything in order, place your order and wait for that success text. You should not experience any 2fa shit if you have a non-vbv secured card from WCC.

  • Don’t make any activity in the site and just log out and wait for the emails
    The email for order confirmation should not take more than 4 mins to arrive to your inbox

    The delivery email should take at most 2 days to notify of delivery started

    The items should arrive in your drop in about 2 days from the day of delivery started notification

After Carding

Only visit the site again when your items have started shipping
You can try to card other items in the site. If in any case you experience error in processing, just ship a cheap item to billing address and continue shipping to drop address

Happy carding !



Any questions pm

    Extra tips & tricks https://t.me/carding_team_bot   on telegram      

TOOLS 🔨(Download) HOW TO GET DROP CARDING HELPdesk 🆘 CARDING METHODS
